title: Golf Clubs
summaries: Golf Clubs are tools used in the golf minigame. There are four types of Golf Clubs, the Driver, Iron, Wedge, and Putter, which are each used to hit the Golf Ball a different horizontal and vertical distance.
Special variants of Golf Clubs can be unlocked by achieving different <linked>golf scores</linked>. All upgrades are purely aesthetic, despite being more expensive as the tier increases.
